panels.title: Google Storage Retry Failures by Method (front50, $Front50Instance)

targets.expr: label_replace(sum(label_replace(sum(rate(clouddriver:google:safeRetry__totalTime_total{instance=~"$Instance",scope="zonal",zone=~".*$GcpRegion.*"}[$__interval])) by (operation, phase, zone) / sum(rate(clouddriver:google:safeRetry__count_total{instance=~"$Instance",scope="zonal",zone=~".*$GcpRegion.*"}[$__interval])) by (operation, phase, zone), "cell", "$1", "zone", ".*-(.)")) by (phase, operation, cell), "operation", "$1", "operation", "compute.(.*)")
